last_episode_to_air.name: Episode #1.1
last_episode_to_air.overview: el principio de la gran seleccion de colombia en los 80s

name: La Seleccion
overview:
A story, between reality and fiction, that recreates everything Carlos 'El Pibe' Valderrama (Edgar Vittorino), Freddy Rincón (Antonio Jiménez), José René Higuita (Jhon Alex Castillo) and Faustino Hernán Asprilla (Omar Murillo) had to go through. .

Learn through the lives of these historical and emblematic characters and players, the history of the best Colombian team of all time.
